title: Add Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy pages with footer links and required acceptance during registration

requirements.summary: Create a Terms and Conditions page at route /terms with comprehensive placeholder template text
acceptanceCriteria: New route /terms is accessible and renders the Terms and Conditions page
Page displays comprehensive placeholder text covering marketplace terms
Content is presented in a clean, scrollable format
Template text includes sections for user responsibilities, intellectual property, payment terms, dispute resolution, and liability

file_operations.description: Create a new page component that displays comprehensive Terms and Conditions placeholder text in a scrollable format. Include sections for user responsibilities, intellectual property rights, payment terms, dispute resolution, liability disclaimers, account terms, prohibited activities, refund policy, and governing law. Use semantic HTML with proper heading hierarchy and styling consistent with the existing application theme.
Register the /terms route in the TanStack Router configuration to render the TermsAndConditions page component. Add the route alongside existing routes in the router setup.

requirements.summary: Create a Privacy Policy page at route /privacy-policy with comprehensive placeholder template text
acceptanceCriteria: New route /privacy-policy is accessible and renders the Privacy Policy page
Page displays comprehensive placeholder text covering privacy practices
Content is presented in a clean, scrollable format
Template text includes sections for data collection, usage, cookies, third-party services, security, and user rights

file_operations.description: Create a new page component that displays comprehensive Privacy Policy placeholder text in a scrollable format. Include sections for information collection, data usage, cookies and tracking, third-party services, data security measures, user rights (access, correction, deletion), data retention, international transfers, children's privacy, and contact information. Use semantic HTML with proper heading hierarchy and styling consistent with the existing application theme.
Register the /privacy-policy route in the TanStack Router configuration to render the PrivacyPolicy page component. Add the route alongside existing routes in the router setup.

requirements.summary: Update the Layout component footer to include links to Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy pages
acceptanceCriteria: Footer section contains clickable links to /terms and /privacy-policy
Footer is displayed consistently across all pages
Links are styled appropriately and accessible

file_operations.description: Add clickable links to the Terms and Conditions (/terms) and Privacy Policy (/privacy-policy) pages in the existing footer section. Position the links appropriately within the footer layout (e.g., before or alongside social links). Ensure links use TanStack Router's Link component for proper navigation and apply consistent styling with other footer elements. Maintain all existing footer content including social links.

requirements.summary: Add required acceptance checkboxes for Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy to ProfileSetupModal
acceptanceCriteria: Two checkboxes are displayed in the profile setup modal for Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
Each checkbox label includes a clickable link to the respective legal page
Submit button is disabled until both checkboxes are checked
Form validation prevents submission without acceptance

file_operations.description: Add two required checkbox fields to the profile setup form: one for Terms and Conditions acceptance and one for Privacy Policy acceptance. Each checkbox label should include a clickable link (using TanStack Router Link component with target='_blank') to the respective legal page (/terms and /privacy-policy). Add form state to track both checkbox values (termsAccepted and privacyPolicyAccepted booleans). Disable the submit button when either checkbox is unchecked. Include both boolean fields in the UserProfile payload when calling saveCallerUserProfile mutation. Add validation feedback if the user attempts to submit without accepting both.

requirements.summary: Add required acceptance checkboxes for Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy to ArtistRegistration page
acceptanceCriteria: Two checkboxes are displayed in the artist registration form for Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
Each checkbox label includes a clickable link to the respective legal page
Submit button is disabled until both checkboxes are checked
Form validation prevents submission without acceptance

file_operations.description: Add two required checkbox fields to the artist registration form: one for Terms and Conditions acceptance and one for Privacy Policy acceptance. Each checkbox label should include a clickable link (using TanStack Router Link component with target='_blank') to the respective legal page (/terms and /privacy-policy). Add form state to track both checkbox values (termsAccepted and privacyPolicyAccepted booleans). Disable the submit button when either checkbox is unchecked. Include both boolean fields in the ArtistProfile payload when calling the registerArtist mutation. Add validation feedback if the user attempts to submit without accepting both.
